title: Call of Duty 4 - Razor1911 - Eric
description:
Orginally uploaded by ----->Razor1911 but i copied it as my friends had problem with 001 files. 
How to install_____
1. mount Iso-file with daemon tools to start intstall
2. After install delete any shortcuts on desktop (they are cd required)
3. Run the setupLauncher Called: CoD4MW-1.4-1.5MP-PatchSetup.exe. Let it install.
4. Go to the folder where you have installed the game
5. Make one shortcut for iw3mp and one for iw3sp and place them like on your desktop.
6. For playing online dont use key generator, dont know why i uploaded it but im not gonna change it now :P Instead when in the Multiplayer game, press this button Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â§ and type: Connect and then the ip you want to connect to. for example: Connect 32.14.154
get ip adresses for private servers at http://www.private-servers.info/Callofduty4.html


Thats probably all and hope its ok Razor1911 that i upload your file :D
